Red.description: Holy magic that engulfs the enemy

Blue.description: A follow up thrust for True Thrust.

Blue.description: Increases attack for your next hit for all allies.

Blue.description: A low sweep with your weapon.

Yellow.description: Raise an ally from the dead.

Yellow.name: Holy
Yellow.description: Deals holy damage to multiple enemies.

Yellow.name: Glare
Yellow.description: Deals holy damage to a single enemy.

Yellow.name: Temperance
Yellow.description: Temporarily decreases damage taken for all allies.

Yellow.name: Dia
Yellow.description: Remove a negative status effect from an ally.

Green.name: Storm's Path
Green.description: A storming swing that hits multiple enemies.

Green.name: Holmgang
Green.description: Prevent your HP from dropping below 1 for 2 turns.

Green.description: A spinning attack that hits multiple enemies.

Green.name: Fell Cleave
Green.description: A strong attack that cleaves an enemy.

Green.name: Decimate
Green.description: A powerful attack that hits at the cost of your HP.

Green.name: Rend
Green.description: A jumping attack that hits a single enemy.

Purple.name: Fire II
Purple.description: Advanced version of Fire with hotter flames.

Purple.name: Fire III
Purple.description: A massive firestorm that damages an enemy.

Purple.name: Blizzard

Purple.name: Blizzard III
Purple.description: A massive Blizzard that hits multiple enemies.

Purple.name: Thunder II
Purple.description: Damage over 2 turns for multiple enemies.

Purple.name: Mana Font
Purple.description: Next spell can be cast for free.

Purple.name: Flare
Purple.description: A powerful explosion that hits multiple enemies.

Purple.description: Increase the rank of your next spell.
